duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and perform all logistical functions including receiving, handling, and shipping.
Responsible for inventory control, storage and handling, shipping and delivery management, transportation, safety and quality control.
Recommend hiring, disciplining, firing, evaluating, and training actions for staff.
Inspect, document, and report 5S audit results on a monthly basis to ensure quality and safety.
Tracks inventory, coordinates and schedules shipments, and monitors correct inventory disbursement.
Manage payroll information, safety talks, and company Standard Operating Procedures (SOP) Manual.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Business, Logistics, Materials Management or combination of education and experience.
